DOC.brief_summary: The goal proposal test efficacy primary care-delivered , print-based physical activity intervention Latinas type II diabetes . The investigator test efficacy intervention randomize 80 Latinas type II diabetes recruit UCSD Health System primary care either adapt web-based physical activity intervention standard care , assess physical activity gain six 12 month . The ultimate goal develop print-based physical activity intervention diabetic Latinas could widely disseminate primary care .
DOC.brief_title: Primary Care-Based Physical Activity Diabetic Latinas
DOC.detailed_description: Studies show adoption regular physical activity ( PA ) greatly enhance diabetes management prevention . Individuals adopt PA routine show significant improvement clinical marker diabetes , include HbA1c , glucose tolerance , insulin sensitivity , weight waist circumference , significant reduction medication use , also show reduction cardiovascular risk factor related co-morbidities . Incorporation cost-effective PA intervention primary care diabetes treatment could therefore enhance overall health quality life significantly reduce healthcare cost . The primary aim study conduct small randomize trial ( N=80 ) test efficacy individually tailor culturally adapt print-based physical activity intervention integrate primary care increase weekly moderate-to-vigorous physical activity Latinas type II diabetes , compare receive standard care .
DOC.criteria: Women selfidentify Latino ( country origin designate Hispanic/Latino origin Census Bureau ) Have receive physician 's diagnosis type II diabetes currently see primary care physician Currently inactive , define participate least moderate intensity physical activity le 60 minute per week Medical condition may make exercise unsafe , include congestive heart failure , severe musculoskeletal problem pulmonary condition , condition determine refer physician preclude unsupervised exercise Unable receive mail material ( mail address ) Unable engage physical activity least 30 minute Have current plan pregnancy Planning move area within next year
